alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:07AM MST until January 18 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the Casper area. Higher amounts up to 7 inches are possible along the foothills of Casper Mountain on the south side of Casper. Outside of the Casper area, accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are expected. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until noon Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
